buffs.description: [Tribe Fortification], is applied even when Cleric is in Time Shop, and can be increased up to 250 for human units.
buffs.name: Tribe Fortification (Human and Orc)

buffs.description: Increases the maximum value of [Innervate 2], to 50%. Thus, reducing skill cool time (Outland Battle) by up to 50%.
buffs.name: Innervate 2
